text: HMS Broadsword may refer to: ==Ships== * , was a launched in 1946 and broken up in 1968. * , was a Type 22 frigate launched in 1975. She was sold to the Brazilian Navy in 1995 and renamed Greenhalgh. ==In fiction== *HMS Broadsword, a fictional Royal Navy destroyer in Jeffrey Archer's First Among Equals == See also == * , another name for the Type 22 frigate. * , a 1943 British Royal Navy ship Category:Royal Navy ship names
